item.title: By: joseph

item.description: @Alek K. The widget isn't available for download. It is part of the widget collection available to users of wordpress.com
item.content:encoded:
@Alek K.
The widget isn’t available for download. It is part of the widget collection available to users of wordpress.com

item.title: By: Alex K.

item.description:
Hello Joseph,
I'm new to WordPress. Saw your widget. Want to download it. How do I do it? Thanks.
Alex
